Q6: You and your @illinoistech colleagues have installed an @easyXAFS machine.   What is XAFS and its utility in nuclear materials science?

A5: In general, at MRCAT and @illinoistech, we are willing to try to give any type of experiment a go. We have developed apparatus to safely study radioactive materials in a variety of environments. Contact us #NuclearScienceWeek
